data.text:
Just stayed in Hilton garden inn Izmir and the whole stay has been brilliant. 
Close to Ege Perla and also Folkart towers (the big red buildings) which are both great for eating. 
Also close via taxis to other malls which are great. (Taxis right outside hotel).
The staff in the hotel have been great and sorted any queries we had straight away. Cihan was also brilliant, constantly asking if we needed anything. 
Just a lovely stay. 

Jamie
data.title: Jamie Taylor. Hilton Garden Inn Izmir

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Değerli Misafirimiz,

Öncelikle yoğunluğunuzun arasında bizlere zaman ayırıp otelimizle ilgili düşüncelerinizi paylaştığınız için çok teşekkür ederiz.

Sizlerin görüşleri bizim için son derece kıymetli olup, bunlarla kendimizi geliştiriyor ve sizlere daha iyi hizmet vermeye çalışıyoruz.

Otelimiz, özellikle de personelimiz  ile ilgili yapmış olduğunuz olumlu görüşleriniz ve memnuniyetiniz bizleri çok mutlu etti. 

Sizlere layık olabilmek için inanın daha çok çalışacağız. 

Sizleri tekrar otelimizde ağırlamak dileğiyle, Konaklamada bizi seçtiğiniz çok teşekkür ederiz.

Bize Güvenebilirsiniz

Saygılarımla

Sevil Görgülü
Genel Müdür
HGI Izmir Bayraklı
sevil.gorgulu@hilton.com
0090 2324959500
owner_response.author: Sevil g

data.text: Excellent extended stay. Everyone was very professional and eager to help with any questions or requests. Cihan, the manager, personally arranged for drivers in the beginning to assure our needs would be met. He clearly set the tone for welcoming and treating all the guests.
data.title: Five Star experience hands down

data.text: The staff went above and beyond. It all stems from Cihan. He flawlessly helped us with a room issue due to our neighbors and plan extra trips and even provided input for the drivers. I would also like to highlight the other star members such as Ekin who made breakfast and dinner at the restaurant so special with her hospitality and eagerness to share Turkish culture with a smile. Amil was also great and when Ekin was not at breakfast, he had our coffee order ready as soon as we sat down. The omelette station was also amazing. The chefs took great pride in their meals and were the best omelettes we ever had. Thank you Cihan and your wonderful staff.
data.title: 5 star experience!

data.text:
I am quite happy with this hotel and the room they gave to us. 
Employees are kind and very friendly.
Breakfast and menu for lunch or dinner are great. 
Location of the hotel is also pretty good.
I will definitely stay here again in my next visit to Izmir!
data.title: Kind employees, clean rooms with great view

data.text: I have stayed here for 2 nights with a group of 23 pax as their tour guide. As well as receiving excellent feedback from my group I am also very satisfied with all the services we’ve received during our stay. The front office was extremely helpful in every aspect, very polite and welcoming. The rooms were spotless and comfortable. The restaurant, including the service personnel and the variety of food served at the breakfast and dinner buffets were beyond our expectations. I would like to thank all the personnel on behalf of the group and myself for making our stay so perfect.
data.title: Excellent experience
